Headline: Temporary #66 Westbound Reroute near Chicago/Monticello
ShortDescription: 66 Westbound buses are temporarily rerouted via  Chicago, Homan, Augusta, Pulaski and return to Chicago near Chicago/Monticello.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Westbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Homan, Augusta, Pulaski and return to Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago/Monticello.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Lavergne
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Cicero, Washington, Laramie, and Madison, due to, Police activity  near Madison/Lavergne.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with delays at Washington following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with delays at Washington following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service in both directions and will conclude at 4:30 p.m.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at LaSalle
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at LaSalle due to a sick customer. Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at LaSalle due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
